title: Which subject to choose in jan term

posts.cooked_content:
Hii all…i know this may not be the correct platform to ask this question.
Actually i have 3 diploma subjects to cover - MLP, JAVA, TDS. So which 2 subject should i choose for this term?
posts.cleaned_text: Hii all…i know this may not be the correct platform to ask this question. Actually i have 3 diploma subjects to cover - MLP, JAVA, TDS. So which 2 subject should i choose for this term?

posts.cooked_content: Don’t take TDS, this subject should be taken in the end else you might have some problem
posts.cleaned_text: Don’t take TDS, this subject should be taken in the end else you might have some problem

posts.cooked_content:
TDS at the end best. Gives you the best chance of doing well in it.

Kind regards
posts.cleaned_text: TDS at the end best. Gives you the best chance of doing well in it. Kind regards

posts.cooked_content: Yes you should do tds after mlp only it really help you alot trust me
posts.cleaned_text: Yes you should do tds after mlp only it really help you alot trust me

posts.cooked_content: You should focus on TDS at latter stage of your diploma
